title: Crystal Bowl Meditation - Oswegoland Park District
description: Relax and restore at the cozy Little White School Museum for this special event. You will be surrounded by candlelight while the soft sounds and vibrations of crystal bowls fill [...]
cleaned_text: Events - This event has passed. Crystal Bowl Meditation December 8, 2022 @ 6:45 pm - 7:45 pm Relax and restore at the cozy Little White School Museum for this special event. You will be surrounded by candlelight while the soft sounds and vibrations of crystal bowls fill the room, balancing your chakras and mood. A guided meditation will be presented to ease stress and reset expectations. Please bring a yoga mat, blanket, bolster or pillows, and wear comfortable clothing. No prior meditation experience needed. Register in advance, space is limited.
